description: Easy Delivery Co. is a game about delivering packages.

v0.0.4.description:
# **Changes**
Added option for perfect deliveries
Added option to add locations for blind bags
Added option to add locations for snowcats
Fixed generating with more than one Easy Delivery Co. player
v0.0.4.title: Easy Delivery Co. Archipelago v0.0.4

v0.1.0.description:
## Changes
Added yaml option to add locations and items for radio towers
Added yaml option to block tunnels behind receiving items
Added yaml option to prevent entering the factory without the handheld radio
Added yaml option to receive car upgrades directly
Added a simple in-game tracker to see what items are received and how many locations are checked
Added in-game settings (click "mods" in the bottom right corner of the options)
Moved the DeathLink toggle to the settings
Connection details now gets saved in the savefile
Opening a save now attempts to connect to the saved connection. Can be toggled in the settings
The in-game archipelago console/text client is now a default off setting
## Notes
⚠️ The in-game tracker can only be closed by the x in the top right corner
Intercity jobs doesn't take tunnels and radio towers as items into account. This should be accounted for in the logic, but might cause some confusion
v0.1.0.title: Easy Delivery Co. Archipelago v0.1.0
